targets.expr: sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_hit_value{service="${service}", cache_type="in_memory"})) by (entity_name) * 100/ (sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_hit_value{service="${service}", cache_type="in_memory"})) by (entity_name) + sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_miss_value{service="${service}", cache_type="in_memory"})) by (entity_name) )

panels.title: In Memory Keys Count per entity

targets.expr: sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_hit_value{service="${service}", cache_type="distributed"})) by () * 100/ (sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_hit_value{service="${service}", cache_type="distributed"})) by () + sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_miss_value{service="${service}", cache_type="distributed"})) by () )

sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_hit_value{service="${service}", cache_type="distributed"})) by (entity_name) * 100/ (sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_hit_value{service="${service}", cache_type="distributed"})) by (entity_name) + sum(rate(feature_retrieve_cache_miss_value{service="${service}", cache_type="distributed"})) by (entity_name) )
